author: nishant0
content: Yeap, the ddos vector is for the relay not the proposer.

author: nishant0
content: But falling back to the local EL, might delay block proposal time. And if it is delayed enough, there is a possibility of the block being orphaned

author: ravensslayer
content: A lot of miners on twitter said we should delay the merge over MEVBoost

author: nishant0
content: It is important to note, that MEVBoost is completely optional

author: nishant0
content: also given that in the current mainnet, relays are running with the same exact issues indicates this isn't an actual big deal.
